title: I'm having 2 strings string 1) "abc" string 2) "xya" . Both are indexed to a string called "name" Then i'm trying to search for a* . It's giving both the strings. but i need the sting abc since it starts with a. This is what i'm expecting
description: I'm having 2 strings string 1) "abc" string 2) "xya" . Both are indexed to a string called "name" Then i'm trying to search for a* . It's giving both the strings. but i need the sting abc since it starts with a. This is what i'm expecting since i gave the search sting as a*
